event.title: Introductory workshop on Linux & Free Software in Berlin, Germany

body.p: The Berlin group of FSFE, in cooperation with the Gilberto-Bosque-VHS Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg, is organising an information event with a lecture and workshop at the Software Freedom Day. The topic the event it the end of Windows 10 support and GNU/Linux + Free Software as an alternative

ul.li: Registration via the pages of the VHS, lecture and workshop will be held in German
